base_rate.explanation: Base Rate is the rate at which a positive outcome occurs in Data. In formula it is, Pr(Y=pos_label) = P/(P+N).

num_instances.explanation: Num Instances counts the number of examples in Data.

num_negatives.explanation: Num Negatives counts the number of negative labels in Data.

num_positives.explanation: Num Positives calculates the number of positive labels in Data.
